about_the_game:
Fun and Games Book

This Fun and Games-themed book unlocks 20 additional levels for Coloring Pixels! All images are of toys, games and activities that are fun for all ages!

Rediscover your childhood joy with this book!

Contents

The Fun and Games book unlocks the following images:
  • Cup and Ball - 33x120
  • Bowling - 80x50
  • Swings - 84x187
  • Dominoes - 100x125
  • Royal Game of Ur - 113x210
  • Paper Planes - 115x66
  • Tower Block - 120x110
  • Ball Games - 131x134
  • Pinball - 145x168
  • Roll-Play - 161x145
  • Checkmate in 2 - 180x200
  • Paintball - 184x70
  • House of Cards - 200x150
  • Arcade Machine - 200x200
  • Marble Run - 220x200
  • Garden Games - 223x223
  • Senet - 225x150
  • Hopscotch - 239x173
  • Boxing - 245x246
  • Virtual Reality - 290x185

  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics

  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
